definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
(coll.) not at all (humble expression denying compliment)/don't mention it

sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授讲的话原原本本纪录下来然后记住。

sentences.english: The cap passes close word, can accelerate the rate of trichomadesis.
sentences.chinese: 帽子过紧的话，会加快脱发的速度。

sentences.english: Who speaks words that are lovelier than those of Jesus?
sentences.chinese: 有谁说的话比耶稣更动听？

sentences.english: Do we get a salary slip even if we sign up for direct deposit ?
sentences.chinese: 如果工资直接存款的话，能拿到工资条吗？

sentences.english: P is for Pray-reading, with prayers chew God's Word.
sentences.chinese: 是祷读，借由祷告来咀嚼神的话。

sentences.english: The fact that you have control over all the clients helps.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，你能够控制所有客户的话是很有帮助的。

sentences.english: If you do, you will master the English language step by step.
sentences.chinese: 这样的话，你就能一步一步地说一口流利的英语了。

sentences.english: Then, the Silk Street will be a good choice.
sentences.chinese: 那样的话，秀水街是个不错的选择。

sentences.english: And to accept that - to quote him - "it shoots, it hits".
sentences.chinese: 引用作者的话，便是，箭在射，箭打中了靶心。

sentences.english: He could really help you, if you needed him.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要他的话，他真能帮上你的忙。

sentences.english: "If it's the same unknown subject," Rizzoli said.
sentences.chinese: “如果是同一个人干的话”，芮黎真说。

sentences.english: His heart was finally stirred by her remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他终于被她的话打动了心。

sentences.english: It took Cindy a long time to catch on to what Bill was saying.
sentences.chinese: 辛迪许久以后才突然明白比尔所说的话。

sentences.english: When it occurs in the back near the spinal cord or the nerve roots, it can be very painful.
sentences.chinese: 如果正好发生在脊椎或神经附近的话会非常痛苦。

sentences.english: Ken's words turned out to be a huge lie.
sentences.chinese: 阿健的话结果是一个天大的谎言。

sentences.english: In other words, exclusions are quite standard.
sentences.chinese: 在其他的话，排除是相当的标准。

definition: like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
